cta.title: Behind Every Team Is A Roar Of Fans
cta.subtitle: Fans are the backbone of every team, but can they rise up to the challenges ahead? Enter the world of KBOOM and compete for your favorite teams.

partners.title: Our Partners
partners.subtitle: Our trusted Partners helping us in breaking the barriers between Teams and Players!

features.title: Your Ultimate Fan Experience
features.description: KBOOM makes every moment count. You are not just a Fan, you are a part of the team!

engage.title: Engage. Win. Repeat
engage.description: KBOOM makes following your favorite teams and engaging with them easy. Choose your teams, add them to your roster, and engage with each of their Quests. Completing multiple Quests can get you ranked up in your team's favor! But be warned, not all Quests are created equal...

newsletter.title: Subscribe to our
newsletter.subtitle: Newsletter
newsletter.description: We know, you can't wait for KBOOM to go live... To make the wait go by a little smoother, join our weekly newsletter, offering an immersive dive into the esports world. Whether you're a hardcore gamer, a casual fan, or just curious about this booming industry, our newsletter has something for everyone.
